lines: Time was I took on every odd job offered me, runnin' messages an' cullin' pesky fauna like a good little adventurer. But I'm well past that now. These days there's only one thing on my mind, and it's what's brought me here.
To survive in this uncertain world, a man's gotta know both his talents an' his limits. I've done my part in the fight─the rest is up to you an' yours, my friend.
With the Black Wolf slain an' his pack scattered, Revenant's Toll's begun to take on new life. As for me, I daresay I'm beginnin' to see a future worth livin' for─a future not ruled by vengeance.
Thank Rhalgr, you're safe! I was watchin' when they stormed the Risin' Stones. The way your comrades were bein' manhandled, you would've thought they were criminals o' the worst order.
That ain't no way to treat the heroes what saved the realm! What in the hells is goin' on...?

After all that commotion, I'm right relieved to see that the Risin' Stones is back in your hands. Whatever mess it was you were in, I knew you'd pull through, and you have! Now you can get back to the business o' savin' the world, eh!?
